content.rendered:
Piklist v0.9.9.10 is live on WordPress.org.

This version fixes many bugs that have been reported, has been tested with WordPress 4.7.3, and is compatible with PHP 7.1.

We are still working on the next major version of Piklist. It’s taking longer than expected, but we guarantee it will be super awesome. Though we don’t feel comfortable committing to a release date yet, please know we are all working on fixes and unit tests for this version every week.

Piklist is still very important to Kevin, Jason and me. All three of us are developers and we use Piklist everyday with our clients. We are just as excited to get the next major version of Piklist released as you are.
